channel.title: Comments on: So you want a Windows 8 Phone?
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Steve Hughes (DataOnWheels)
item.dc:creator: Steve Hughes (DataOnWheels)
item.description: Data guy turned mobile guy! Nice review. I also enjoy the simplicity of use between the three platforms - Win8 Pro, Win8 RT, and Windows Phone.
item.content:encoded: Data guy turned mobile guy! Nice review. I also enjoy the simplicity of use between the three platforms – Win8 Pro, Win8 RT, and Windows Phone.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Make sure to get the App Highlights as well as Nokia Maps and Nokia Driven for your phone
item.content:encoded: Make sure to get the App Highlights as well as Nokia Maps and Nokia Driven for your phone
